attacks.name: Caturday
attacks.effect: Draw a card. If you do, this Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Ear Kinesis
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon for each damage counter on that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
